About Me

Full name: SON, DO HONG
City: Ho Chi Minh

Facebook: fb.com/sondh5

Hello I'm Son Do. I am from Hanoi and now working in Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam.
I graduated from FPT University Hanoi. I started web development with Ruby on Rails from September 2016.
My technology stack: Ruby/Ruby on Rails; MySQL/PostgreSQL; HTML/CSS/jQuery. I also have experience of setting up and building application with Amazon web services: S3, EC2, Cloudfront, Cloudwatch, etc.
I would say that I am an extroverted, enthusiastic person and proud of my ability to persevere and overcome challenges.
